mapper.select: SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, IST.INQUIRY_STATUS, I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, M.U_NICK, S.S_COM_NAME FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS IST ON (I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = IST.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID) INNER JOIN MEMBER_LIST ML ON (I.MEM_ID = ML.MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (ML.U_ID = M.U_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SELLER S ON (ML.S_ID = S.S_ID) ORDER BY I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED DESC, I.INQUIRY_ID DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}
